    Make AB timeline

    make_AB_timeline.Rd

    Make AB timeline

    make_AB_timeline(
  num_trials = 5,
  events = c("A", "B"),
  A_onsets = 1,
  A_durations = 50,
  B_onsets = 50,
  B_durations = 50
)

    Arguments

    num_trials

    integer, the number of trials to add to timeline

    events

    character vector, defaults to A and B events

    A_onsets

    integer vector, the onset times for each A event on each trial

    A_durations

    integer vector, the duration times for each A event on each trial

    B_onsets

    integer vector, the onset times for each B event on each trial

    B_durations

    integer vector, the duration times for each B event on each trial

    Value

    data.frame

    Examples

    make_AB_timeline(
 num_trials = 5,
 events = c('A', 'B'),
 A_onsets = 1,
 A_durations = 50,
 B_onsets = round(rnorm(5,100,10)),
 B_durations = 50
)
#>    trial_num event onset duration offset
#> 1          1     A     1       50     51
#> 2          1     B   100       50    150
#> 3          2     A     1       50     51
#> 4          2     B   108       50    158
#> 5          3     A     1       50     51
#> 6          3     B   108       50    158
#> 7          4     A     1       50     51
#> 8          4     B   105       50    155
#> 9          5     A     1       50     51
#> 10         5     B    97       50    147
